title: Metene Shower Brush with Soft and Stiff Bristles, Bath Dual-Sided Long Handle Back Scrubber Body Exfoliator for Wet or Dry Brushing
descriptions:
**Product Name:** Metene Shower Brush with Soft and Stiff Bristles

**Product Details:**

Experience the best of both worlds with our Metene Shower Brush. This dual-sided brush features soft nylon bristles for gently cleaning and effectively washing your skin, and stiff natural bristles for exfoliating skin, usable in both wet and dry conditions.

The brush handle is made of wood, providing a sturdy and durable grip. It measures 17 inches in length, making it easy to reach all areas of your back and body. The handle also features a non-slip rubber patch and a hanging rope for added convenience and safety.

This shower brush requires minimal maintenance. We recommend replacing it every 3-6 months for optimal performance. For hygiene purposes, it's best to clean the brush every few weeks.

**Package Contents:**

1 x Metene Shower Brush

Experience the perfect balance of gentle cleansing and deep exfoliation with our Metene Shower Brush. Order yours today!
